name: places/ChIJ4y0mU7j3wokRivjtxqk8PZM
formattedAddress: 805 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 805 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025-5966, USA

originalText.text:
It was my first time, digital check in was easy, the young lady in the front instructed me on how to prep (face washing area). The aesthetician, Luisa, was the sweetest. She talked me through the entire process, let me ask any skin care related questions I had and even wrote down a new routine for my skin. It was so relaxing that I almost fell asleep.

The site itself was bright and clean. For my budget, it was expensive and more of a “treat yo self” kind of thing BUT it was very much worth it. My skin looked amazing after.

originalText.text:
Excellent staff and service. I went for the first time and had an expert dermaplaning, and immediately signed up for a membership.

While the treatments are short (30 minutes), I had a better overall experience than I did with an Upper West Side spa that charged me almost 3x as much and took an extra half hour.

My face was soft, smooth, and felt great in the days after. Can’t wait to go back for a facial!

originalText.text: I love Glowbar! I have been a longtime member, and was so excited to check out W100th! The space is gorgeous, and all of the staff was fantastic. As usual, my facial was thorough and thoughtfully tailored to my specific skin concerns. I can't wait for next month's treatment!

text.text: I love Glowbar! I have been a longtime member, and was so excited to check out W100th! The space is gorgeous, and all of the staff was fantastic. As usual, my facial was thorough and thoughtfully tailored to my specific skin concerns. I can't wait for next month's treatment!

originalText.text: This was my first Glowbar experience, which happened to be on their opening day, and I couldn't be more pleased! Everyone was super friendly and welcoming upon walking in. The girl who did my facial, Sky, was very knowledgeable and made me feel super comfortable. Definitely worth trying if you're thinking about it!

text.text: This was my first Glowbar experience, which happened to be on their opening day, and I couldn't be more pleased! Everyone was super friendly and welcoming upon walking in. The girl who did my facial, Sky, was very knowledgeable and made me feel super comfortable. Definitely worth trying if you're thinking about it!

originalText.text: Had a great experience on my first visit to Glowbar! My esthetician made sure I was comfortable and that she accommodated my goals for the visit. The space is clean and practical. Great products, too. Had a great experience and can’t wait to return for my next monthly facial!
